header.contentHeader: We believe that engagement will create positive changes in society, impulse justice in the reach of resources to create a sustainable development.

Body.contentAboutUs: Soc Trang Center For Social Science Engagement (SCSE) is a non-governmental organization operating in social science, under Soc Trang Union of Science and Technology Associations.
Body.contentGoal: We believe that connectivity will create positive changes in society, impulse fairness in access to resources, and contribute to sustainable development.
Body.contentVision: SCSE believes that the appropriate connection will create positive changes in society, promote internal strength and increase opportunities to access resources and contribute to sustainable community development.
Body.contentMission: SCSE's mission is to connect resources in the society to ensure equitable access and development opportunities for disadvantaged groups in society based on science and professional assistance.

Footer.content1: We are not the ones who make the change, but we can engage different resources. This contribute to the change in society, and create a better life.

Partner.whatistheexpectationincooperatingwithSCS: What is the expectation in cooperating with SCSE ?

Story.Content1: Starting from fragments of the past, childhood is incomplete, unhappy like many other children,  working hard, helping the family from an early age,... But, it's not just a personal story, it's a common situation of children in Soc Trang province at that time. Think of yourself and then think of others! Bringing a desire to help more children, to educate sex and popularize social knowledge for the people and the Khmer ethnic community in the province,... Since then, a journey to love has started!
Story.Content2: Go with kind beliefs, in addition to the desire to improve the life quality of people in the province in general and Khmer people in Soc Trang in particular, the popularization of social knowledge, issues on Gender and Gender Equality, LGBTQ+, Community, environment, education,... Soc Trang Center For Social Science Engagement carries with it good responsibilities, with the desire that more and more children, women, youths gradually improve their health status, family and social problems. Hoping to bring knowledge, useful activities to harmonize themselves, to be more optimistic, stronger and more integrated with the community.
Story.MKKVDV: A DESIRE FOR THOUSANDS OF THINGS FOR
Story.Content3: 13 years of kindling the idea, Mrs. Huong, came out from the rise and fall of her life with the desire to establish Soc Trang Center For Social Science Engagement in the province, lucky to find great partners. Starting from separate impressive ways. Mrs. Huong - an active member of the Soc Trang Province Women's Association; Mr. Giang - the teacher with great heart, has found a lot of faith in his teammates, but perhaps, the most common thing in them personally, is the desire to establish a Community Connection Center in the province for people's lives here are somewhat improved,for to see more children go to school, all of them are loved and happy.

Donate.ContentTop: Soc Trang Social Science Service Connection Center (SCSE) is a non-governmental organization operating in the field of social sciences, affiliated to the Union of Science and Technology Associations of Soc Trang Province.

ContentMid.TTKND: SOCIAL SCIENCE SERVICE CONNECTION CENTER SOC TRANG (SCSE)

Donate.ContentBot: * Statements and guarantees We guarantee that the money donated by the donors will be used for the legitimate purposes and for the purpose of the organization's activities. In addition, the money that has been donated is non-refundable and becomes the property of SCSE. *

CSBM.Content: At SCSE Foundation, we take privacy very seriously. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our program beneficiaries, sponsors and supporters, and anyone else who interacts with us. This Privacy Policy applies to the SCSE Organization. SCSE collects, uses and stores personal information to assist us in our work of helping people in need. Disclosure of this information is made only under very strict limitations and never to third parties without your consent.
